OOC: Is EVERYONE obsessed with blowing me up.

::Aerotaur::
    He flings himself back leaving his staff buried in Godfather's stomach.  
The explosives explode in front of him.  He brings his arms up to protect his 
face.  The backs of them get scorched but no major damage.  His guns pop out 
of his arms and he opens fire with 7 shots out of each of the 4 barrels.  
(Two double barreled guns mounted on the backs of his forearms.)
